summary: Greynier Wulfheart is a custom male follower which uses the "MaleBrute" voice
descriptionHtml:
[color=#00ffff][size=4]Disclaimer[/size]
[/color]
This is the first mod I've ever uploaded and it probably won't be my last. 

Any feedback/criticism/bug reporting is more than welcome, I will constantly be looking for ways to improve the mod for the best experience possible.
I plan on giving him entirely new custom dialogue, as wells as quests. 
If you would like to be a part of the project to help with quests/voice acting. Contact me through the Nexus

[color=#00ffff][size=4]Description[/size][/color]

Greynier Wulfheart is an early stage of a follower mod which I intend to grow into and entire faction/questline. He uses the "MaleBrute" voice and wields a Greatsword, though you can swap his weapon out with whatever you choose. He starts off with enchanted Nordic carved armor and has Brynjolf's Fine clothes as his default outfit.

[color=#00ffff][size=4]Location

[/size][/color]He can be found drinking away his frustrations at Candlehearth Hall in Windhelm.
